js_cve.uaf_basic: var arr = []; for(var i=0; i<1000; i++) { arr[i] = new ArrayBuffer(0x100); } delete arr[500]; arr[500] = null; app.alert("CVE-style UaF simulation - harmless");
js_cve.resetform_corrupt: var f = this.getField("dummy"); if (f) f.value = "overflow attempt"; this.resetForm(["dummy"]); app.alert("resetForm pattern - CVE-2023-21608 like");
js_cve.font_spray: var spray = []; for (var i = 0; i < 500; i++) { spray[i] = new Uint8Array(0x400); } app.alert("Font spray pattern - CVE-2023-26369 sim");
js_cve.3d_annot: var annot = this.addAnnot({page:0, type:"3D"}); annot.setProps({3DData:"fake U3D marker for CVE sim"}); app.alert("3D annotation trigger sim - Foxit PRC style");
js_cve.v8_old: var buf = new BigUint32Array(100); buf[0] = 0xdeadbeef; eval("app.alert('Old V8 pattern - Foxit 2020 CVE sim')");
js_cve.annot_reply: var note = this.addAnnot({page:0, type:"Text"}); note.replyTo = "malformed reply chain sim"; app.alert("Annotation reply corruption sim - Foxit 2024");
